actions.text: Amendment SA 851 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 58. Record Vote Number: 206.

Amendment SA 851 proposed by Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 850. (consideration: CR S7369-7371; text: CR S7366) To authorize the Secretary of Energy to waive the ethanol mandate on the East and West Coast in the event of a significant price increase or supply interruption.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 851 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 58. Record Vote Number: 206.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 851 proposed by Senator Bingaman to Amendment SA 850.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 851 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 58. Record Vote Number: 206.

amends_amendment.purpose: To eliminate methyl tertiary butyl ether from the United States fuel supply, to increase production and use of renewable fuel, and to increase the Nation's energy independence.

purpose: To authorize the Secretary of Energy to waive the ethanol mandate on the East and West Coast in the event of a significant price increase or supply interruption.
